channel.title: Easiest way to get item list?
channel.description: So I really want to get an item list out of my server. Since I went through my item.cfg and for some reason have like 15k things in there. Now that's some insanity. Considering some of it has names like Dragon_Defender it makes it irritating to search for a dragon defender. Does someone know a way (or tool) to get just the item ID and what the item is out of the cfg? would be so much help

item.title: Easiest way to get item list?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hold on asshole (lol) you have to see this.
Oh… Nevermind. I’ll just drop box it since pastebin won’t let me post something over 500KB lmao.
item.cfg
Feel free to look in that hell of a file.

Read full topic
